questList.questDescription: Defeat the Broken Behemoths and bring peace to the fractured highlands. Beware of their immense strength and resilience.
Eliminate the Formicid Venom Mage and stop the toxic plague from spreading further. The venom mage is known for its deadly spells.
Unite with the Moth of Suppression to calm the chaotic winds sweeping through the shattered highlands. The moth's silent wings hold great power.
Confront the fiery Balrug and extinguish the flames of the Crimson Wasteland. Be wary of its infernal strength and destructive power.
Defeat the Firebrand Imp, a mischievous demon dancing amidst the fiery chaos. Stop its fiery tricks from causing further mayhem.
Unite with the Salamander Stormcaller to bring rain to the scorching wasteland and quench the flames. The stormcaller commands the power of thunder and lightning.
End the reign of Shadowweaver by defeating the malevolent entity in the heart of the Shadowed Abyss. Only by vanquishing this darkness can light return to the Glimmering Reaches.
Put an end to the Phantom Stalker's haunting presence in the Shadowed Abyss. Its ethereal nature makes it a formidable foe.
Unite with the Revenant to face the Corrupted Souls plaguing the Shadowed Abyss. The vengeful spirit seeks justice for its tormented existence.
